questions.criteria: Student submitted deployed live application URL
questions.message: Student did not submit a deployed live application URL
Application does not load at the deployed URL given
Student did not submit a GitHub URL
GitHub Repo does not contain application code

sections.message: Keep your browser console open and watch out for errors from this point forward.

questions.criteria: Application has a title visible and remains static through the program.
questions.message: Application does not have a title visible or disappears from the browser.

questions.criteria: Uses a pleasant color theme throughout
questions.message: Project does not utilize colors to enhance the user experience
The application does not respond to window-resizing

questions.criteria: The application has at least three discernable features.

options.description: The application does not contain any resemblance of an intended feature.
The application has only one discernible feature.
The application has two discernible features.
The application has three discernible features.

questions.criteria: Code does not needlessly repeat itself.

options.description: The application code has frequent repetitious code.
The application code repeats itself occasionally but is generally succinct
The application code Code does not needlessly repeat itself.

questions.criteria: Code should be readable and properly indented, following camelCase naming conventions.

options.description: Variable names are not in camelCase and indentations are frequently misplaced.
Variable names are in camelCase but the code is not indented properly/difficult to read.
The code is readable and properly indented, following camelCase naming conventions.

questions.message: GitHub Repo does not have a unique name

questions.criteria: Repository follows best practices for file structure and naming conventions
questions.message: Repository does not follow best practices for file structure and naming conventions

questions.criteria: Repository contains multiple descriptive commit messages
questions.message: Repository does not contain adequate descriptive commit messages

questions.criteria: Application uses tools taught so far in the course and looks and responds as expected for the current skills of the developer.

options.description: Application does not accomplish what it intended.
Application is lacking a completed feel to it.
The application is missing a polished look but still functions well and accomplishes its purpose.
Application uses tools taught so far in the course and looks and responds as expected for the current skills of the developer.
